keel.Algorithms.Discretizers.ExtendedChi2_Discretizer

Class Discretizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Discretizers.ExtendedChi2_Discretizer.Discretizer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedChi2Discretizer

    public abstract class Discretizer
extends java.lang.Object
    File: Discretizer.java A general framework for Chi Discretizers. This class contains all common operations in the development of a discretizer algorithm. Any discretizer can extend this class and, by implementing the abstract "discretizeAttribute" method, getting most of its work already done.
    Since:
    JDK1.5
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Salvador García (University of Jaén - Jaén) 31/12/2009

    • Method Detail

      • buildCutPoints

        public void buildCutPoints(InstanceSet is)
        Creates the cut points for each attribute with the given dataset. The cut points are generated by the execution of the abstract method "discretizeAttribute" where the different discretize will be implemented.
        Parameters:
        is - given dataset.

      • inconsistencyCheck

        public double inconsistencyCheck(Instance[] instances)
        Returns the inconsistency percentage of the given instances.
        Parameters:
        instances - given instances.
        Returns:
        the inconsistency percentage of the given instances.

      • applyDiscretization

        public void applyDiscretization(java.lang.String in,
                                java.lang.String out)
        Applies the discretization stored on the cut points.
        Parameters:
        in - original dataset filename.
        out - discretized dataset filename.

      • sortValues

        protected void sortValues(int attribute,
                          int[] values,
                          int begin,
                          int end)
        Sorts the instances values of the attribute given.
        Parameters:
        attribute - attribute to be sorted.
        values - sorted indeces.
        begin - First position of the section to sort.
        end - Last position of the section to sort.

      • getNumIntervals

        public int getNumIntervals(int attribute)
        Returns the number of intervals in the given attribute.
        Parameters:
        attribute - given attribute.
        Returns:
        the number of intervals in the given attribute.

      • getCutPoint

        public double getCutPoint(int attribute,
                          int cp)
        Returns the cp-th cut point of the given attribute.
        Parameters:
        attribute - given attribute.
        cp - given cut point index.
        Returns:
        the cp-th cut point of the given attribute.

      • discretizeAttribute

        protected abstract java.util.Vector discretizeAttribute(int attribute,
                                                        int[] values,
                                                        java.util.Vector<Interval> intervals,
                                                        double levelSig)
        This abstract method creates the cut points of the attribute given using its values for each instances given. Every Chi discretizer should implement this method with its particular scheme.
        Parameters:
        attribute - given attribute to discretize.
        values - given attribute values in the dataset.
        intervals - given intervals.
        levelSig - Sigma level.
        Returns:
        the cut points of the attribute given

      • discretizeAttributePreliminary

        protected abstract java.util.Vector discretizeAttributePreliminary(int attribute,
                                                                   int[] values,
                                                                   java.util.Vector<Interval> intervals)
        This abstract method creates a preliminary cut points of the attribute given using its values for each instances given without sigma level. Every Chi discretizer should implement this method with its particular scheme.
        Parameters:
        attribute - given attribute to discretize.
        values - given attribute values in the dataset.
        intervals - given intervals.
        Returns:
        the cut points of the attribute given

      • obtainIntervals

        protected abstract java.util.Vector<Interval> obtainIntervals(int attribute,
                                                              int[] values,
                                                              int begin,
                                                              int end)
        Returns the discretized intervals of the given attribute.
        Parameters:
        attribute - given attribute to discretize.
        values - given attribute values in the dataset.
        begin - First position of the section to discretize.
        end - Last position of the section to discretize.
        Returns:
        the discretized intervals of the given attribute.

      • discretize

        public int discretize(int attribute,
                      double value)
        Discretizes the given value of the given attribute.
        Parameters:
        attribute - given attribute.
        value - given value to discretize.
        Returns:
        the discretized value.

        public int discretizeTMP(int attribute,
                         double value)
        Discretizes the given value of the given attribute with the temporal cut points.
